mapper.select: select id , name , pwd , birth , phone , image , email , post , address , detail_address , subject , enroll_date , start_date , end_date , status , sort , employee_date from member where id = #{id} and pwd = #{pwd} and status = 'Y' and sort = #{sort}
mapper.insert: insert into member ( id , name , pwd , birth , phone , image , email , post , address , detail_address , subject , enroll_date , start_date , end_date , status , sort , employee_date ) values ( #{id} , #{name} , #{pwd} , to_date(#{birth},'RR/MM/DD') , #{phone} , default , #{email} , #{post} , #{address} , #{detailAddress} , #{subject} , sysdate , to_date(#{startDate},'RR/MM/DD') , to_date(#{endDate},'RR/MM/DD') , 'Y' , #{sort} , sysdate )
mapper.delete: update member set status = 'N' where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where id = #{checkId}
select alarm_no , id , alarm_content , alarm_type , status , create_date from alarm where id = 'user01' and status = 'N'

select SUBJECT_NO ,CLASS_NO ,SUBJECT_NAME ,TO_CHAR(START_DATE,'RRRR/MM/DD') as start_date ,TO_CHAR(END_DATE,'RRRR/MM/DD') as end_date ,DAY ,MAXIMUM_SEATS ,CURRENT_SEATS ,FEE from subject where status = 'N' order by start_date
select id , NAME , SUBJECT , STATUS , SORT from member where sort = 2 and status = 'Y' and subject is null order by name
select id , NAME , SUBJECT , STATUS , SORT from member where sort = 2 and status = 'Y' and subject = #{subject}
mapper.update: update member set subject = null where id = #{id} and sort = 2
